anime.title: Anime Convention Printing Services
anime.heroSubhead: From Doujinshi to 11x17 prints, we have everything you need for your next Anime Convention.
anime.description: Anime conventions are visual feasts, and your table needs to stand out. We understand the specific needs of anime artists: vibrant colors for prints, correct binding for manga, and fast turnarounds for last-minute con crunch. Whether you're selling at Anime Expo, Otakon, or a local show, we've got your back.
tips: Order your books at least 3 weeks before the con to avoid rush fees.
Matte covers reduce glare in convention hall photos.
Standardize your print sizes (11x17, A4) to make buying frames easier for customers.

furry.title: Furry Convention Printing Essentials
furry.heroSubhead: High-quality badges, zines, and art books for the furry community.
furry.description: The furry community values quality and tactile experiences. Our rich, color-accurate printing ensures your commissions, badges, and zines look exactly as intended. We offer specialized stocks that feel as good as they look.
tips: Offer a range of price points: Buttons/Stickers -> Prints -> Zines.
Saddle stitch booklets are perfect for short comics or sketch collections.
Bring business cards with your commission info!

comic.title: Comic Con Printing Services
comic.heroSubhead: Standard American comic sizes, graphic novels, and marketing fliers.
comic.description: Whether you are pitching to a publisher or selling directly to fans, your comic needs to look professional. We offer industry-standard US Comic sizes, glossy covers, and crisp interior printing that rivals the big houses.
tips: US Standard Comic size is 6.625" x 10.25". We have templates for this!
Full bleed is essential for dynamic panels.
Don't forget flyers or bookmarks to put in bags with purchases.

general.title: Event & Convention Printing
general.heroSubhead: Brochures, programs, signage, and marketing materials delivered on time.
general.description: Organizing an event or setting up a corporate booth? You need reliability above all else. We provide high-volume printing for programs, flyers, and banners with strict quality control and guaranteed delivery timelines.
tips: Keep text away from the trim line (Safety Zone).
High-gloss finishes attract attention under convention lights.
Bulk ordering flyers significantly reduces cost per unit.
